pic1_alt: R Consortium ISC Call for Proposals 2024! Opens on March 1st! A blue background with translucent, connected hexagons invokes a scientific feel.
pic2_alt: The R Consortium logo. A dark blue letter R is in a circle composed of 12 smaller, filled circles, 7 of which are the same dark blue, and 5 of which are a light blue-gray. The word consortium is in black.
